# Ruby metaprogramming examples

module Cacheable
  def self.included(base)
    base.extend(ClassMethods)
  end

  module ClassMethods
    def cache_method(method_name)
      original_method = instance_method(method_name)
      cache_var = "@_cache_#{method_name}"

      define_method(method_name) do |*args|
        cache = instance_variable_get(cache_var) || {}
        
        unless cache.key?(args)
          cache[args] = original_method.bind(self).call(*args)
          instance_variable_set(cache_var, cache)
        end
        
        cache[args]
      end
    end
  end
end

# Usage
class Calculator
  include Cacheable

  def fibonacci(n)
    return n if n <= 1
    fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2)
  end
  cache_method :fibonacci
end

calc = Calculator.new
puts calc.fibonacci(40) # Fast due to memoization
